title: Pixle 3A touchscreen continually freezing and becoming unresponsive
content:
Google Pixle 3A touchscreen will randomly freeze and become unresponsive. This has probably happened between 5-10 times.

I have tried:

1. Restarting the phone - doesn't work
2. Plugging charging cable into phone via computer, this has fixed the problem a few times but it has now also stopped working

Any tips? 

All I have not yet done is a factory reset. 

Thanks, from a very very frustrated long time Pixle fan (possibly for not much longer!).
